title: Using LINQ to SQL with WCF - the Brad and Angelina of Data Access (Part 3)
sessionTitle: Using LINQ to SQL with WCF - the Brad and Angelina of Data Access (Part 3)
eventShortDescription:
LINQ to SQL has been out for a while now. Come and hear SSW experiences and hear if it is ready or not.
Find out how you can

  • use LINQ to SQL with WCF
  • the right way to structure your projects
  • 6 helpful tips
